contents:
It’s Time to Cast Your Vote for Travel & Leisure’s World’s Best Awards 

 

 

 

Each year, Travel + Leisure magazine celebrates the best in the business with its esteemed “World’s Best” awards, shining the spotlight on readers' favorites in categories including airlines, cities, and hotels

 

We’re honored that WestHouse is included in this year’s World’s Best Awards. Located in the artistic and cultural epicenter of New York City, we pride ourselves on offering our residents a home away from home with the elegance of an Uptown apartment and the refined luxuries of a boutique hotel. 

 

To cast your vote, simply visit the awards website by March 6, 2017. Choose the hotel, airline, or other favorite you’d like to review. You’ll have a chance to rate them in different areas of excellence and leave a comment. Did we mention respondents will be entered to win a $10,000 dream trip for two, among other great prizes? So don't hesitate; vote now!
